Title: V-Neck Cutout-Waist Evening Dress

Sizes: 12, 4, 8, 10, 6, 14

Colors: royal

Category: formal-gowns

----

Featured-image: C206-royal-v-neck-cutout-waist-evening-dress_p.jpg

----

Description: A chic and stylish gown that features a V-neck and open waist at the hips. The bust and center of the waist are jeweled with beads and sequins. The sequins fall into the skirt where the floor length gown is split in the front. The open back adds to the sex appeal of this gown.
